name: claude-atlassian-plugin
description: Atlassian (Confluence + Jira) CLI integration for managing wiki pages and issue tracking with built-in constitution for safe data modification

plugins.name: claude-atlassian-plugin
plugins.description: Atlassian (Confluence + Jira) CLI integration. Manages Confluence pages and Jira issues with constitution hooks that enforce user confirmation before any create/update/delete operations.
